custom-meta.meta-value: The atomic coordinates and structure factors of PRV gB, gB-D_IV and 1H1 Fab have been deposited into the protein data bank (PDB) under the accession codes 5YS6, 5YS2, and 5YSL respectively. The EM map of PRV gB in complex with 1H1 Fab can be accessed in the electron microscopy data bank (EMDB) with the entry EMD-6841.
